power.title: Brash Strike
power.fluff: With a battle cry, you throw your whole body behind your attack
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength +2 vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Hammer or Mace: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: You grant combat advantage to the target until the start of your next turn.

power.title: Cleave
power.fluff: You hit one enemy, then cleave into another
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one enemy within your reach other than the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
true 1 Axe: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier to the second enemy.
true 1 Heavy Blade: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier to the second enemy.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Crushing Surge
power.fluff: The feel of your weapon crunching against an enemy puts your heart back in the fighting
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + number of healing surges you have spent damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Level 11: 3 + Constitution modifier temporary hit points.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier + number of healing surges you have spent damage, and 6 + Constitution modifier temporary hit points.

power.title: Dual Strike
power.fluff: You lash out quickly and follow up faster, delivering small wounds to two foes
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC (main weapon)
true Hit: 1[W] (main) damage
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] (main) damage.
Secondary Target: one creature other than the primary target
Secondary Attack: Melee weapon one creature other than the primary target Strength vs. AC (off-hand)
true Hit: 1[W] (off-hand) damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] (off-hand) damage.

power.title: Footwork Lure
power.fluff: You press the attack, engaging your enemy before falling back and drawing it after you
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: You shift 1 square.
If you hit the target, you slide it up to 1 square. The target must end this slide in the space you left or closer to it than it started.

power.title: Glimmering Blade
power.fluff: After a successful strike, you teleport away to appear where your enemy least expects
power.section: Prerequisite: You must be eladrin, and have the fey step racial power.
Requirement: You must have your fey step racial power available.
Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence +1 vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you teleport up to 2 squares to an unoccupied space adjacent to the target.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
Miss: You teleport up to 1 square to an unoccupied space adjacent to the target.

power.title: Grappling Strike
power.fluff: You hew your foe with a simple attack and then grab it with your empty hand to keep it from escaping
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Brawler Training: You can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack when making a reactive strike.

power.title: Knockdown Assault
power.fluff: You smash your weapon into your foe so hard that the enemy loses its footing
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. Fortitude
true Hit: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and you knock the target prone.
true 1 Level 21: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Mobile Assault
power.fluff: With practiced ease you maneuver over the battlefield
power.section: true Effect: You move a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier.
Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Light Blade or Spear: Additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: If you did not move the full distance before, you can move the remaining squares.

power.title: Reaping Strike
power.fluff: You punctuate your scything attacks with wicked jabs and small cutting blows that slip through your enemy's defenses
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: Ability modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
1 Level 21: 2 + ability modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
If you are wielding a melee weapon in two hands, you can use your Strength modifier for this damage. If you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand, the ability depends on the weapon's group:
1 Axe, Hammer, Mace, Pick: Constitution modifier.
1 Flail, Heavy Blade, Light Blade, Spear: Dexterity modifier.
1 Polearm, Staff: Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Resolute Shield
power.fluff: As you slash into your foe, you pull your shield into a defensive position between the two of you, guaranteeing that it absorbs at least some of the enemy's attack
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Effect: You gain resist all equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier against the target's attacks until the end of your next turn.
1 Level 11: Equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.
1 Level 21: Equal to 8 + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Shield Feint
power.fluff: With subtle movements and misdirection, you use your shield to keep your opponent unsure about your next attack
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +3 power bonus to your first attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Miss: You gain a +1 power bonus to your first attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Slash and Pummel
power.fluff: You follow up a quick slash of your weapon with a powerful punch from your free hand
power.section: Primary Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] damage.
Secondary Attack: Melee touch same target Strength +2 vs. Reflex (no weapon)
1 Level 11: Strength +4
1 Level 21: Strength +6
true Hit: 2 + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Critical: Add one-half your level to the damage (minimum 1).
true 1 Level 11: 5 + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Level 21: 8 + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Sure Strike
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength +4 vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] damage.
Miss: 1 + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
1 Level 21: 2 + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Threatening Rush
power.fluff: You storm into the midst of your foes, ensuring that their attacks are directed against you
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] damage, and you mark each enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] damage.
Miss: You mark one enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Tide of Iron
power.fluff: After each swing, you use your shield to shove your foe backward, and then step into the vacated space
power.section: bold Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true bold Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 italic Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
bold Effect: You push the target up to 1 square if it is no more than one size category larger than you.
If the attack hit, you can shift the same number of squares to a space adjacent to the target.
1 italic Level 21: Push up to 2 squares.

power.title: Vicious Offensive
power.fluff: You smash into your opponent with such force that a nearby enemy can't help but take notice
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true You mark an enemy within 5 squares of you who can see and hear you. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Crit: You mark a number of creatures within 5 squares of you up to your Charisma modifier instead.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Weapon Master's Strike
power.fluff: You shift your tactics to match the situation, maximizing your weapon's advantage against your foe
power.section: true Effect: You may sheathe a weapon and draw a different one.
Attack: Meleeweapon one creature Strength vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Axe: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Heavy Blade: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and Reflex against the target's attacks until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Mace: You slide the target up to 1 square.
true 1 Spear or Polearm: Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes reactive strikes from you when it shifts.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Wicked Strike
power.fluff: Your swing might be cumbersome, but it packs quite a punch when it connects
power.section: Attack: Meleeweapon one creature marked by you Strength -2 vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + twice your Strength modifier damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + twice your Strength modifier damage.
